Name: TruthGundlach
Text: No question Josh Allen has a cannon arm but he’s yet to connect on a deep vertical route in his Bills career!Every try’s been a wasted down.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Josh Allen has had receivers open on the vertical many times this season. To his credit he has read it. But he has not once made the throw.
